_remove_this_attribute: Edit this json file and rename it as 'data.json'. The paths should be absolute.
The 'remote' attribute indicates the name of the remote. 'origin' is set as the default name.
If the 'mode' attribute is set as 'pull', it's pull only mode.
If the 'mode' attribute is set as 'push', it's push only mode.
If the 'mode' attribute is set as 'both' or it doesn't exist, it's both pull and push mode.
